title: Marinated Grilled Salmon
directions: in a gallon zip-top bag combine the light soy sauce, minced garlic, bourbon, brown sugar and cracked pepper. Mix well to disolve the sugar. Add the salmon fillets and coat the fish with the marinade. Refrigerate for 15 - 20 minutes.
Remove the fillets from the marinade and discard the marinade. Brush the fillets with oiive oil.
Cook the fillets on a prepared med - high heat grill or in a preheated grill pan for 3-4 minutes on each side depending on how done you prefer your salmon and how thick the fillets are.
Remove from the heat and squeeze a lemon wedge over the fillet and sprinkle with the parsley.
